CBCGPRibbonBar m_wndRibbonBar;

if (!m_wndRibbonBar.Create(this))

ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Add ribbon initialization to the main frame class

CODE.LINE: // If Ribbon creation code is not present in CMainFrame::OnCreate
// let's create it
if (!m_wndRibbonBar.Create(this))
return -1;
// Add the the following code in MainFrm.cpp file
// right after m_wndRibbonBar.Create
// in CMainFrame::OnCreate.
if (!m_wndRibbonBar.LoadFromXML (_T("IDR_BCGP_RIBBON_XML")))
return -1;
// If your CMainFrame::OnCreate in MainFrm.cpp file already has
